Tampa.The Ritz Ybor: The Ritz Ybor is a nationally registered historical special events venue in Tampa, Florida. Various artists such as Lady Gaga, Tiësto and Purity Ring have performed sold-out shows since the business first opened its doors on June 26, 2008.. In addition to concerts, The Ritz Ybor has also hosted various events such as the 2009 Maxim Super Bowl Party, the annual Ken Walters’ Celebrate Sinatra, the annual Gorrie Gala and the BET Black Carpet Party.
